Package com.xebisco.yield

Klasse ContextTime

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.ContextTime
public class ContextTime extends Object
It's a container for time-related variables

  • Konstruktordetails

    • ContextTime

      public ContextTime(double targetFPS)

    • ContextTime

      public ContextTime()

  • Methodendetails

    • setTargetFPS

      public void setTargetFPS(double targetFPS)
      This function sets the target sleep time based on the desired frames per second.
      Parameter:
      targetFPS - The target frames per second (FPS) that the program should aim to achieve.

    • getTimeScale

      public double getTimeScale()
      Returns the scale of the context time.
      Gibt zurück:
      The timeScale variable is being returned.

    • setTimeScale

      public void setTimeScale(double timeScale)
      This function sets the timescale of the context.
      Parameter:
      timeScale - This is the timescale of the context. The default value is 1.0.

    • getDeltaTime

      public double getDeltaTime()
      Returns the time in seconds since the last frame.
      Gibt zurück:
      The time in seconds since the last update multiplied by the timescale.

    • setDeltaTime

      public void setDeltaTime(double deltaTime)
      This function sets the deltaTime variable to the value of the deltaTime parameter.
      Parameter:
      deltaTime - The time in seconds since the last update.

    • getTargetSleepTime

      public long getTargetSleepTime()
      Returns the target sleep time in microseconds
      Gibt zurück:
      The target sleep time.

    • setTargetSleepTime

      public void setTargetSleepTime(long targetSleepTime)
      This function sets the target sleep time to the value passed in.
      Parameter:
      targetSleepTime - The amount of time the thread should sleep for in microseconds.
